name: Hansel & Bretzel
description:
Play as the infamous witch in the Hansel and Gretel tale. Catch the reckless children who dare to walk in front of your house, feed them some tasty soup to make them fat and plump then roast them nice and crispy.  

Eating is "the name of the game".  Eat or die. 

Game instructions and hints :

Can be played with a controller or WASD+left mouse button, menu navigation is with the mouse even if you play the game with a controller.

- Catch children, lock them up

- Collect mushrooms for the soup

- Feed the soup to the caught children

- Once they are fed enough soup, a burping sound will let you know that they are ready for roasting

Enjoy the game !

This game was made during a weekend for the Epic Game Jam 2022.

Credits:

Frédéric Cottier - Programmer/3D Art

François Hennemann - 3D Art

Jean-Yves Schäl - 3D Art

Plume - Music
